lyrics:
18 contributorsmr redundant lyricsverse 1
got on the u down to kings cross station
where the cross kids were smoking in the street
mr redundants got a boy in london
asking questions no one had a right to be

refrain

verse 2
i saw the crosses of empty cathedrals
whose prospects were hanging out in bars
mrs facetious got a man who preaches
what the beatles believed
love is all you need

hello to curlin up with a bottle

verse 3
well the pregame was bad
but the postman was worse
and the president kept saying shit that wed already heard
so we kept the tv off
and i kept on writing songs
that i knew youd come to hate
if you ever knew what they were about

dont shout at me like im across the room
when im right here when youre right this time
well do better in another life in another time with another

ah dey are dey are

but well let you know said well let you know
